[/URL]

After a successful local get together last year, Jersey Air-cooled Club would like to
invite you to a weekend campout in Jersey. This is not a show as such but a get together
with like minded people, enjoying what the island has to offer, there will be no food or trade stands,
We have secured an area at one of our local campsites, which has all the normal facilities. Shop,
restaurant, pool, Etc. We will have a marquee for socialising and music

http://www.campingjersey.com/

Dates for the weekend Friday 5th to Sunday 7th June, obviously if you wish to
arrive earlier or stay longer it wont be a problem. There is a lot to do on the island,
places to visit, and amazing beaches.

This weekend coincides with the Jersey International Festival of motoring.
We hope to organise an area at the show to display peopleâ€™s buses if they wish.

http://www.jimf.je

Ferries are from Poole on the new fast Catamaran or on the conventional ferry from Portsmouth.

http://www.condorferries.co.uk/offers/view-book-your-2015-travel-and-save

Hope to see you there

Just a quick report.. Had a great weekend with mostly Jersey people, but a huge thanks to those that made the effort to join us from the mainland.
Will be doing this again Thanks
